name: opening_contrast
text: When the words you need hang in the air… misunderstandings grow.

name: private_hesitation
text: Imagine an impartial guide—always ready, always listening.

name: dual_isolation
text: I felt overlooked when our plans changed last minute…
tone_direction: character voice - Alex, anxious but honest

name: emotional_visualization
text: An AI that sees beyond words—capturing the emotion beneath.
tone_direction: reflective, intimate, echo on 'sees beyond words'

name: jamie_turn
text: I was scared you'd be frustrated if I spoke up…
tone_direction: character voice - Jamie, vulnerable but hopeful

name: phases_motion
text: Five phases—set intent, speak freely, reflect, truly listen, then find solutions side by side.
tone_direction: steady, encouraging, gentle uplift on 'side by side'

name: reunion
text: No screens. No judgment. Just two hearts guided by gentle AI.
tone_direction: warm, intimate, soft falloff on 'gentle AI'

name: agreement_touch
text: I'm grateful we can move forward—together.
tone_direction: character voice - Alex, grateful and peaceful

name: ripple_connection
tone_direction: uplifting, hopeful, whisper 'small moments', confident 'big leaps'

name: final_promise
text: Understand-me. Your AI companion for heartfelt conversations—anytime, anywhere.
